Summary: very large orange/red lights blinking in a v shaped pattern on for a few secounds going out then blinking on again then disappear
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Lake Wales
There were 2 other sightings in Lake Wales on or around January 19th 2012
divs: sighting details on feb. 19th 2012 around 7:40 pm just before dark and the sky was clear my girlfriend and i were headed east on state rd. 60 in lake wales, florida going to walmart we were stopped at a redlight when my girlfriend asked me what am i seeing? i said i don't know? it was out of my view, so i looked up towards the direction she was looking and to my surprise i saw very large bright orange\red blinking lights that appeared in a v shaped pattern like a giant spot light had been turned on in the sky vanished then blinked on in the same pattern was on again for a few seconds then vanished, the size of the lights were atleast as big as my car and around 10 or so lights making up a v shaped pattern. i have never seen anything in my life like this and have no explaination on what it could be but it has left me wondering if in fact we are not alone?
